message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds a significant value to us at $15,000, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Given its worth to you at $12,000, I propose a fair compromise. Would you be interested in acquiring this product for $13,500? I believe this price reflects the value it brings to both of us. Looking forward to your positive response.
